description: Erection of an additional storey and associated works.
decision_conditions: The proposed extension, by reason of its scale, siting and design, would result in a wholly incongruous feature within the Tolworth Close street scene, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the area. The proposed development would therefore, be contrary to policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The proposed extension, by reason of its scale and siting, would appear overbearing to the occupiers of 460, 462 and 464 Ewell Road, to the detriment of their living conditions. The proposed development would therefore, be contrary to policy 7.6 of the London Plan and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
Condition 5 (Landscape Scheme) - The RBK Tree & Landscape Officer has reviewed the information provided and is satisfied this can now be approved.
The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Condition 5 (Landscape Scheme) of planning permission 19/01043/FUL is hereby fully approved.
